title: Nanoskin BLUE DRESS Premium Dressing 1 Gallon - Sprayable Interior & Exterior Dressing for Car Detailing | Works on Tire, Vinyl, Rubber, Plastic & Trim | Safe for Cars, Trucks, Motorcycles, RVs & More
features: ✅ FOR EXTERIOR & INTERIOR: Works on interior and exterior tires, vinyl, rubber, plastics and dashboard surfaces to restore original OEM look that will not attract dirt or dust. Dilute from 1:1 to 2:1 for interior applications. Read full label and instructions, prior to application.

✅ PROTECT AGAINST FADING: Nanoskin Blue Dress restores and protects vinyl, rubber, and plastic car parts with a “like-new” look and brilliant shine. Rubber, plastic and vinyl will last longer and look better with regular application. This formula shields from harmful rays that fade, crack and break surfaces.

✅ DRY TO THE TOUCH: With proper dilution, Nanoskin Blue Dress enhances a new look and dry-to-the-touch feel on vinyl upholstery, door panels, dashboards, and center consoles. Restore and protect any exterior or interior vinyl, rubber, or plastic trims.

✅ EASY TO USE: Designed for fast, easy application, Nanoskin Blue Dress can be sprayed or wiped onto tires, rubber, vinyl and plastic. Refined “Not too thin” sprayable formula creates a clinging deep black shine on vertical surfaces that will not attract dirt or dust.

✅ WATER BASED FORMULA: A general purpose, water based silicone dressing produces a gloss finish on all tires, vinyl, rubber, and plastic surfaces both inside and outside the vehicle. Silicone emulsion formula.
description: Ideal for both interior and exterior surfaces, Nanoskin BLUE DRESS Premium Dressing keeps rubber, vinyl and plastic moisturized to prevent fading and cracking. BLUE DRESS is a water-based formula that provides the same durability and "wet look" typically associated with solvent-based dressings.
